page.title: 16LOCAL NEWS (2)
page.content:
Then a shocked Mr Perry found himself flying through the air as the bull tossed him ten feet into the River Camel. Mr. Perry aged 56 and last year's Mayor of Camelford said afterwards,"It followed me into the river,and there was a ten foot bank on the other side and as I climbed up the other side I had never moved faster in my life."
House Prices Most houses are in the price range of Â£15,000 for an old cottage to Â£40,000 for a new house. New houses are the more popular out of the two, because many of the old cottages are being knocked down in this area.
